name: Bower
description:
Despite potential predators. the male bower bird spends most of its life on the ground. He designs, crafts and displays his elaborate home - a bower and decorates it with trinkets of his favourite colour all in an effort to find love. Play as a bower bird! Hop around the surrounding lands in search for blue objects to create the most spectacular nest. Maybe all your hard work will pay off?
